author: Sivasankari Sekar
title: BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 270 Posts
text:
BFUHS Recruitment 2025
The Baba Farid University of Health Sciences (BFUHS) Recruitment 2025 for 270 posts of Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW). Candidates with Diploma Can Apply Online. The online application opens on 06-08-2025, and closes on 26-08-2025. The candidate shall apply online through BFUHS website, bfuhs.ggsmch.org.
BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Notification PDF Download
The BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) Recruitment 2025 Notification PDF has been released on 07-08-2025 at bfuhs.ggsmch.org. Check the complete job details, vacancy, age limit, application fee, selection process and how to apply from the article. You can Check all Latest Sarkari Result Updates of All Central Government Jobs and State Government Jobs.
BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) Recruitment 2025 Notification PDF
Name of the Post: BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) Online Form 2025
Post Date: 07-08-2025
Total Vacancy: 270
Brief Information: The Baba Farid University of Health Sciences (BFUHS) has announced a notification for the recruitment of Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) Vacancy. Eligible Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the notification & Apply.
BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Notification Overview
The Baba Farid University of Health Sciences (BFUHS) has officially released a recruitment notification for Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW). For all details regarding the recruitment process, eligibility, and application procedure, refer to the official notification. Eligible candidates can download it from the link below.

BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) Recruitment 2025 - FAQs
1. What is the starting date to apply online for BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) 2025?
Ans: Starting Date to apply online is 06-08-2025.
2. What is the last online apply date for BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) 2025?
Ans: Last online apply date is 26-08-2025.
3. What is the Eligibility to apply for BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) 2025?
Ans: Diploma
4. What is the Maximum Age Limit to apply for BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) 2025?
Ans: 37 Years
5. How many vacancies are being recruited by BFUHS Multipurpose Health Worker (MPHW) 2025?
Ans: Total 270 Vacancies.
